headline.main: PSA Tells Spain's Rajoy It Will Honor Labor Deals at Opel Plant
headline.print_headline: PSA Tells Spain's Rajoy It Will Honor Labor Deals at Opel Plant

lead_paragraph: PSA Chief Executive Carlos Tavares has told the Spanish government the firm will honor existing labor agreements at Opel's factory in Spain after buying the carmaker, Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy's office said in a statement.
snippet: PSA Chief Executive Carlos Tavares has told the Spanish government the firm will honor existing labor agreements at Opel's factory in Spain after buying the carmaker, Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy's office said in a statement....
